title: Backend Engineer
description: The backend engineer is responsible for the backend development for projectME — a creative file system for brainstorming. It is your very personal internet collection and knowledge base that takes the flow of your thoughts somewhere unexpected, leading to new discoveries and ideas.

any ONE of the following: NodeJS/ GO/ Python/ C++
